version_description: A sound driver bug that caused the game to crash has been addressed.
Support has been added for the Logitech PowerShell Controller + Battery.
You can change your gamepad configuration on the Settings screen.
A number of bugs have been addressed.

We received a report that the alarm going off during gameplay with the device's sound on causes the app's BGM to stop and the player to be unable to progress when:

A) attempting to disembark from modes of transportation
B) after defeating all the enemies in battle

The bug has now been fixed.

We received a report that the alarm going off during gameplay with the device's sound on causes the app's BGM to stop and the player to be unable to progress when:

B) after defeating all the enemies in battle

The bug has now been fixed.

-Large Screen Support:
Full-screen display support has been added for devices with larger screens, such as the iPhone X
-Opening cutscene has been added.
-Small bugs have been fixed.
The title of the app has been changed.
